skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...
skill.author: CesarAugustusGroB

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and design guidance. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or external command execution capabilities detected.

content.value_statement: Build distinctive web components and pages with polished aesthetics. Avoid generic AI-generated visuals and create memorable, high-quality user interfaces.
actual_capabilities: Creates production-grade HTML, CSS, and JavaScript interfaces
Designs distinctive visual aesthetics with custom typography and color schemes
Implements CSS animations and motion effects for polished interactions
Builds React and Vue components with refined design details
Applies creative layouts with asymmetry, spacing, and visual hierarchy
limitations: Does not integrate with backend APIs or databases
Does not create build configurations or deployment setups
Does not write tests or set up CI/CD pipelines
Cannot access external design resources or libraries

use_cases.title: Build polished UI components
use_cases.description: Create distinctive React or Vue components with refined aesthetics and smooth animations.

use_cases.title: Prototype visual concepts
use_cases.description: Transform design concepts into working code with bold, memorable visual directions.

use_cases.title: Design cohesive interfaces
use_cases.description: Build complete frontend pages with consistent typography, color themes, and motion design.

prompt_templates.title: Simple component
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a distinct button component with unique styling, hover effects, and smooth transitions.

prompt_templates.title: Complete page
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a landing page with a bold aesthetic direction, custom typography, and staggered reveal animations.

prompt_templates.title: Interactive dashboard
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a dashboard interface with charts, filters, and smooth state transitions using a brutalist design aesthetic.

prompt_templates.title: Complex app interface
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a comprehensive SaaS interface with navigation, forms, data tables, and modal dialogs featuring a cohesive luxury design language with motion effects.

output_examples.input: Create a login page with a distinctive aesthetic
output: A polished login form with custom font pairing (display + body)
Dark theme with accent colors and subtle gradients
Smooth focus transitions and input validation animations
Responsive layout that works on all screen sizes
Accessible form labels and keyboard navigation

best_practices: Choose a bold aesthetic direction before coding and commit fully to it
Use CSS variables for consistent theming across components
Prioritize high-impact animations over scattered micro-interactions
anti_patterns: Using generic fonts like Arial, Inter, or Roboto for all projects
Defaulting to purple gradients and predictable color schemes
Creating layouts without a clear conceptual vision or design intent

faq.question: Which frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: This skill works with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Vue, and other modern frontend frameworks. It focuses on design quality regardless of the technology used.

faq.question: Can this skill create complete applications?
faq.answer: This skill creates frontend interfaces with design focus. It does not handle backend integration, state management architecture, or build tooling configuration.

faq.question: How does this skill differ from standard code generation?
faq.answer: This skill emphasizes distinctive aesthetics, custom typography, and polished visual details. It deliberately avoids generic AI-generated design patterns.

faq.question: Does this skill access external design resources?
faq.answer: No, this skill does not access external resources. All design decisions and code are generated based on the guidance and context provided in the prompt.

faq.question: What if the generated design does not match my expectations?
faq.answer: Refine your prompt with specific details about your aesthetic preferences, color choices, typography requirements, and visual direction to guide the output.

faq.question: How does this compare to hiring a professional designer?
faq.answer: This skill accelerates frontend implementation and provides design guidance. Complex branding decisions and user research may still require human design expertise.
